steps.name: I navigate to the DemoBlaze home page
I click on "Samsung galaxy s6" product
I click "Add to cart" cart button
I should see success alert "Product added"
I navigate to cart page
I should see "Samsung galaxy s6" in the cart
I should see cart total price
I navigate to the DemoBlaze home page
I add "Samsung galaxy s6" to cart
I add "Nexus 6" to cart
I navigate to cart page
I should see "Samsung galaxy s6" in the cart

steps.name: I should see "Nexus 6" in the cart
the cart total should reflect both products
I navigate to the DemoBlaze home page
I have "Samsung galaxy s6" in my cart
I navigate to cart page
I remove "Samsung galaxy s6" from cart
"Samsung galaxy s6" should not be in the cart
the cart should be empty or show updated total
I navigate to the DemoBlaze home page
I navigate to cart page without adding products
I should see an empty cart
the total should show appropriate message or zero
I navigate to the DemoBlaze home page

name: DemoBlaze Shopping Cart
description:
As a customer on DemoBlaze e-commerce website
  I want to manage items in my shopping cart
  So that I can review and purchase selected products

steps.name: I navigate to the DemoBlaze home page

I close the contact modal
the contact modal should be hidden

I fill the contact form with valid data:
I click "Send message" contact button

I click "Send message" contact button

I click on "Contact" link

I should see appropriate response for "missing_name"

steps.name: I add "MacBook air" to cart
I navigate to cart page
I click place order button
I fill order details partially:
I click close button
I click place order button again
the order form should be empty
I navigate to the DemoBlaze home page

steps.name: I navigate to cart page without adding products
I should see an empty cart
the place order button should be disabled or not visible

As a customer on DemoBlaze e-commerce website
  I want to place orders for items in my cart
  So that I can complete my purchase and receive the products

I view the home page
I should see the navigation bar with all elements
